capabilities
hazards studies and risk assessment and analysis method statement.
implementation and updating of the health, safety and environment
procedures.
establish and maintain a professional relationship with company s contractors,
sub-contractor s hse personnel and multinational workforce.
manage, supervise & conducting the orientation, safety toolbox talks,
training programs.
fire protection and prevention systems.
incident / accident investigation reporting and follow-up actions.
emergency response planning, preparation, training, demonstration and
development.
coordinating the client safety representatives, in establishing and maintaining
compliance with client s safety procedure and contractor s execution plan.
environmental protection and controls through proactive management system.
roles & responsibilities
develop implement and monitor h.s.e system policies and procedures.
to hazard identification and risk assessment (hira)
supervision of every day work on site to ensure strict compliance of safe work
plan by all in their given area of responsibility
safety orientation program, fall protection program, confined space entry
training and fire watcher training program
conduct safety induction training and toolbox safety meeting for engineers,
supervisors and workmen
exercise authority to prevent or stop unsafe acts when immediate action is
required.
conduct weekly safety meeting if needed
scaffolding inspection to ensure that they are made as per the applicable
standards and specifications
helps progress
to impart training to all workers and staff regarding the emergency evacuation
procedure.
implementing the work permit system in the site.
weekly safety inspection joint with client and making deviation report and its
corrective actions and remedial measures.
promoting safety awareness among the working crews and supervisory cadre
to carryout daily / routine plant safety inspection and ensuring compliance of
safety rules and regulations at site.
devising and implementing safety procedures at site according to the type of
job
initiate disciplinary action against the unsafe working people and violators of
safety rules and procedures.
supervision and conducting investigation of accidents and incidents including
near misses, determination of probable causes and enforcing preventive
measures
prepare and keep adequate records of all accidents to prepare such chart as will
show the best way for eliminating hazards and accidents
liaison with client safety representatives and other concerned plant authorities
or contractors on work related safety requirements at site
ensured safety regulations were adhered to and made recommendations in
writing for improving safety conditions and working practices at site
updating of all documents, monthly safety report, training and inspection
report and all safety related documents
